attributes.additional_details:
Google

Is Israel Committing a Genocide against the Palestinians of Gaza?

By Luke Peterson
Yes, Israel is committing genocide

Time to wake up and let the government know it's time to take action and save the innocent. Have we not learnt from our past? When will we put a stop to the atrocities.
attributes.background:
What we are witnessing now is the extension of the program of national erasure against the Palestinians that the Zionist project has always entailed, at times overtly, but more often covertly.
As defined by the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide, Article 2,

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition in its current form as it does not include a clear action for either the UK Government or Parliament. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
